import axios from'axios';const BASE_URL='https://api.locosporlapromo.com/api';const useGameService=()=>{const getGames=async eventId=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');// Obtén el token de sesión
try{const response=await axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/games/").concat(eventId,"/"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return response.data;}catch(error){throw error;}};return{getGames};};export default useGameService;
